meyata sadhaka washayen pahatha sandahan karunu uputa dakwiya haka:  ramalan masa awasan dawas dahaya thula udawana “layilathul kadr” (athi uthumwu rathriya) namin parichchedayak shuddhawu alkuraanayehi sandahanwa pawathima.  allah shuddhawu alkuraanayehi pawasana wita “api layilathul kadr (athi uthumwu) rathriyehi eya (alkuraanaya) anawaranaya kalemu” (shu alakuraanaya 97 : 1).  “layilathul kadr (itha mahangu) rathriya thula kawurun wishwasayen yuthuwa allahgen prasadayan apekasha karamin yagnya karayi da ohuge pera kala papayan kama karanu labe” yayi nabi (sal) thuman pawasuha.

eheyin ‘oba napura karanno’yayi wideshin obata wiruddhawa katha karana namuth, owun obage yahapath ka්riya daka winishchaya dawasedi dewiyan wahanseta gaurawa karana pinisa owun athara yahapath hasirimakin kal gewanna’yi 1 peduru owadan deyi. (2:12) thawada obage dharmishtakama udesa duk windima thulin (2:14), ‘kithunuwan washayen obage yahapath ka්riya daka winishchaya dawasedi dewiyan wahanseta gaurawa karana panisa owun athara yahapath hasirimakin kal gewanna’yi 1 peduru owadan deyi. (2:12) thawada obage dharmishtakama udesa duk windima thulin (2:14) kithunuwan washayen obage yahapath hasirima thulin’ (3:12,17) ‘obata wiruddhawa katha karana aya lajjawata paminenu athayi kithunuwanta mathak kere. (3:16) ese, anyayan wenuwen duk windima thula, obata apahasa karamin obata wiruddhawa katha karana aya lajjawata pamunuwana (3:16), anuwanayange agnyanakama nishshabda kara (2:15), enam owuntath galawima sampadanaya kara dennata samath maha balayak gabwi thibe.

el.ti.ti.ee thrasthawadi sanwidhanaye madakalapuwa pradeshaye mudal anshaye pradhaniya washayen katayuthu kala drawida tharunaya thawaduratath randawa thaba ganimata kolambaa pradhana mahesthrath champa janaki rajarathna mahathmiya eeye (05) niyoga kalaya.wawuniyawa oomanthe madhya maha widyalaye pihituwa athi el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaye samajikayin punaruththapanaya karana kandawure randawa siti me sakakarugen labuna thorathuru matha ohu gana wadidura parikshana wawuniyawa aparadha parikshana departhamenthuwa magin kolambaa aparadha parikshana departhamenthu mulasthanayata bhara di atha.inpasu ohu pilibanda rahas polisiya magin prashna kirima sidukara athi bawath, thawa duratath parikshana pawathwimata athi bawath pawasamin ohu thawa duratath randawa thaba parikshana pawathwimatath parikshanaya pilibanda pragathi warthawak idiripath kirimata dinayak laba dena lesa rahas polisiya adhikaranayen illa sitiye ya.ema ellimata anuwa sakakaru thawaduratath randawa thabagena parikshana pawathwa, parikshana pragathiya pilibanda warthawak pebarawari masa 26 wenida adhikaranayata idiripath karana lesa pradhana mahesthrathwariya rahas polisiyata niyoga kalaya.mese thawaduratath randawa thaba ganimata niyoga kerune, yapanaye kayits hi basnahira pare agachidadas hi padinchi suseyi anthani chals namaththakuta ya.me sakakaru 1997 warshaye di siya kamaththen el.ti.ti.ee thrasthawadi sanwidhanayata sambandhawi mulathiw adampil kandawure ilancheliyan namaththa yatathe mulika puhunuwa laba athi athara, puhunuwen pasu el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaye mudal anshaya ta anuyuktha kara 240 ankaya yatathe agandas sanwidhanaye namak labadi athi bawa parikshana walin heliwi athayi rahas polisiya adhikaranayata wartha kara thibina.pasuwa me sakakaru supandaram el. ti. ti. ee kandawuraka ganakadhikari patamalawak hadara in anathuruwa ema sanwidhanaye mudal anshaye nayaka thamilendra namaththa yatathe, el. ti. ti. ee sanwidhanaya magin pawathwa gena yana ranbhanda kadawala mudal ekathu kirime katayuthu bharawa siti bawath, me sanwidhanayata masakata laksha haththapahaka (75) pamana mudalak labuna bawath sakakaru pawasa athayi rahas polis warthawe thawaduratath sandahan we.rahas polisiya magin adhikaranayata idiripath karana lada sakakaru pilibandawu parikshana warthawata anuwa, ese laba ganna lada mudal el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanaya awi aayudha, wahana, gaman kathana aadi da miladi ganimata yedawu bawath, pasuwa 2004 warshaye di nagenahira palatha bharawa siti karuna amman ema sanwidhanayen wenwu pasu prabhakaran wisin nagenahira pradeshaye mudal anshaye nayakaya lesa ohu path kala bawath, ema pradeshaya 2007 di yuda hamudawa wisin mudaganna thekma ehi sewaya kala bawath, madakalapuwa pradeshaye mudal anshaye nayakayawa sitiyadi rupiyal koti thunaka pamana mudalak masikawa laba ganna bawath ema mudal el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanayata wahana, indhana, aahara, awi, aayudha laba ganimata yedawu bawath heliwe.el.ti.ti.ee sanwidhanayata awashya drawya laba dun kipa deneku athadanguwata ganimata awashya bawa rahas polisiya wadiduratath adhikaranayata danwa sitiye ya.
